title: CSSColors

metadata.description: Learn about CSSColors with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
Color Names Supported by All Browsers
All modern browsers support the following 140 color names (click on a color name, or a hex value, to view the color as the background-color along with different text colors):
For a full overview of CSS colors, visit our 
colors tutorial.

#F0F8FF

practice_exercises.title: Practice Exercise
practice_exercises.description: Create an example that applies the concepts from this tutorial.

related_topics.title: C Common Pitfalls and How to Avoid Them

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

quiz.question: Which best describes the main purpose of this c feature?
quiz.explanation: This feature serves multiple purposes in software development.

summary: This tutorial covers CSSColors concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use CSSColors effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of CSSColors and how to apply it in your projects.
